content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan! Thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your budget for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay the lowest possible rental price.

Please provide me with your offer.

If I am not satisfied with your offer, I can withdraw my interest in the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. I understand your budget, but I am afraid that I cannot accept that price. My apartment is in a prime location in Munich, and I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a premium for the property. May I suggest a rental price of 1200 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I accept the rental price of 1200 Euros.

I agree to the price of 1200 Euros.

Thank you for your offer, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Can you provide me with the necessary documents to complete the lease agreement?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great to hear that you accept my offer! I will provide you with all the necessary documents as soon as possible. You can expect the lease agreement to be signed by both of us within the next week. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
